bibl.title: Thomas Kerr v. William Cochrane. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: Office of the Sheriff of King County } ss Washington Territory

In obedience to the annexed writ of Habeas Corpus, to me directed. I do hereby certify that Thomas Kerr was committed to my custody on the 15th day of December 1888 and is now detained by virtue of a writ of commitment, a true copy of which is here to annexed
I also herewith produce said original writ of commitment.
Nevertheless I have the body of the said Thomas Kerr now here before the court as I am by said writ commanded
Dated at Seattle W.T. this 9th day of Feby. 1889
William Cochrane Sheriff of King County W.T. By M. Gadden Deputy
Sheriffs Fees Taking up Prisoner 1.00 Copy of Writ .40 Travel 20+ Return 50+ .70 $2.10
